duties_responsibilities.duty: Partner with the HR teams across the portfolio of companies on various projects and initiatives.
Manage employee data and systems across the GBU.
Support the evolution of the H&W HR agenda, including organization design, culture, talent management, learning, and key moments in the performance management calendar.
Develop and deliver learning solutions across Health & Wellbeing, in partnership with HR teams across the companies.
Co-create and embed a unified Health & Wellbeing culture to enable the Global Business Unit organization model.
Manage all Health & Wellbeing data, including required GBU reporting from across the companies and data clarity within Workday.
Partner with the finance team on monthly overheads management, reporting, and data quality.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS Required with 3+ year’s HR experience including business partnering experience with the appetite to develop strong business acumen (Acquisition experience is a plus)
